attributes.action: Improve bus links from Brackley(Northants) to Northampton/Bicester and Oxford
attributes.additional_details:
The current bus links to Northampton and Bicester for Oxford , are run at times which do not suite many passengers.
With people who have to visit hospitals in Northampton and Oxford currant bus departs prevent meeting appointments.
Also with the growth of Bicester and with people in Brackley who have a need of a later service back to Brackley as regards to employment in Bicester and Bicester Village.
The  current bus timetables fail to satisfy many who need to travel for the above needs.
